ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Fundamental"), SBQQ__Account__r.Fundamental_Account__c, OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(SBQQ__Account__r.Tax_Code_1__c)), ISBLANK(SBQQ__Account__r.BillingState), ISBLANK(SBQQ__Account__r.BillingCountry), ISBLANK(SBQQ__Account__r.ShippingState), ISBLANK(SBQQ__Account__r.ShippingCountry) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
The account selected is not flagged as a Fundamental Account. Please go into the record and review the Fundamental Account Checkbox.
You must populate the Tax Code, Billing State, Billing Country, Shipping State and Shipping Country
